title: Find current in parallel resistor arrangement

content.question: A simple circuit has a 24.0 V battery and resistors of resistance 3.0 Ω, 6.0 Ω, and R all connected in parallel. If the current through the battery is 15.0 A, what is the value of R ?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
